metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3233 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Open redirect vulnerability in the Overlay module in Drupal 7.x before 7.38allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites andconduct phishing attacks via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
